title: com.google.Keystone
description: Google Keystone preferences to set Auto Update behavior for Google Apps

UpdateDefault.title: Update Default
UpdateDefault.description: Default Update Policy. 0 = Enable Auto Updates 1 = Updates determined by schedule 2 = Auto updates disabled 3 = Auto updates turned off completely

ComponentUpdatesEnabled.title: Component Updates Enabled
ComponentUpdatesEnabled.description: Sets whether components (Flash etc...) are auto updated

UpdatesSuppressedStartHour.title: Start Hour
UpdatesSuppressedStartHour.description: The time, in 24-hour clock format, that auto-updates start. Use a value between 0 (midnight) and 23

UpdatesSuppressedStartMin.title: Start Minute
UpdatesSuppressedStartMin.description: The minute, within the starting hour, that auto-updates start. Use a value between 0 and 59

UpdatesSuppressedDurationMin.title: Duration
UpdatesSuppressedDurationMin.description: The length of time, in minutes, that auto-updates can be made. If you set this value to 0, the system behaves as if no update window is specified

UpdateDefault.title: Update Default
UpdateDefault.description: Default Update Policy. 0 = Enable Auto Updates 1 = Updates determined by schedule 2 = Auto updates disabled 3 = Auto updates turned off completely

TargetVersionPrefix.title: Target Version Prefix
TargetVersionPrefix.description: Set the version of Chrome to pin to (ex. 80.)
